name: ElasticMapReduceClusterBootstrapActionConfig
description: BootstrapActionConfig is a property of the AWS::EMR::Cluster resource that specifies bootstrap actions that Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) runs before it installs applications on the cluster nodes.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the bootstrap action to add to your cluster.

properties.name: ScriptBootstrapAction
properties.description: The script that the bootstrap action runs.
